original_text: All the men from the tribes of Judah and Benjamin reached Jerusalem in three days. It was the 20th day of the ninth month. All the people sat in the yard in front of God's temple. Their bodies were shaking because they were afraid. It was also raining.
korean_text: 유다와 베냐민 모든 사람들이 삼 일 내에 예루살렘에 모이니 때는 아홉째 달 이십일이라 무리가 하나님의 성전 앞 광장에 앉아서 이 일과 큰 비 때문에 떨고 있더니

sentences.original_text: All the men from the tribes of Judah and Benjamin reached Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 베냐민 지파의 모든 남자들이 예루살렘에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: It was the 20th day of the ninth month
All the people sat in the yard
